## Pull Request Title
[Type] Short Description of Change
e.g., [UTIL] Add dateChanger.js utility for date formatting

## Description
Please describe **what** you changed and **why**.  
Include any context or background information that reviewers should know.

- Fixes / Related to issue # (if applicable)

## Changes Made
- Added `src/utils/dateChanger.js` (or other utils)

## How to Test
1. Import the utility in a test file or component
2. Call functions to verify behavior
3. Include sample inputs/outputs if helpful

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Functions tested locally
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Documentation updated (if necessary)
- [ ] PR title and description filled clearly
